ygData.msgSnippet: Thank you thank you Sylly!! Are you still playing your bard much? I would love the spreadsheet if someone has it please :). Maravana Vireo Who is having a very
ygData.messageBody:
Thank you thank you Sylly!!

Are you still playing your bard much?

I would love the spreadsheet if someone has it please :).

Maravana Vireo
Who is having a very serious discussion with her paladin husband about whether there is a minor or more severe experience split discrepancy in a group between a 49th level and a 58th level person, and is getting cold hard data to back her up ;)
Troubador of Deadly Virtues
Mithaniel Marr

>

>

> Sylly Songsynger

> Minstrel somewhere on Innoruuk...
